name: @pflow-dev/pflow-js
description: build share-able petri-net models using an internal-js dsl and html5 canvas

scripts.build: babel src/pflow.js -o src/pflow.js && node -e "p=require('./src/pflow.js'); require('fs').writeFileSync('index.html', p.pflow2html(p.modelSource.func, { baseurl: '.' }));"
scripts.build_obj: babel src/pflow.js -o src/pflow.js && node -e "p=require('./src/pflow.js'); require('fs').writeFileSync('index.html', p.pflow2html(p.modelSource.obj, { baseurl: '.' }));"

author: stackdump
